basis: The user explicitly commits to the plan components (500 ml water, snacks, mindful check-in, breath reset, urge logging) and adds contingency ideas (urge surfing, post-dinner walk) plus a daily log-review, indicating a high likelihood of execution.
cognitive_dissonance: Minor tension between strict adherence and recognition of slip risk; willingness to adapt shows flexible problem-solving.
negative_thought_patterns: Possible all-or-nothing expectation around slips leading to high diligence; anticipatory worry about future slips; mild perfectionism about following the plan exactly.
emotional_triggers: Heat/temperature in Suwon as environmental stressor; urges during social meals; fatigue or boredom; social-meal cues.
coaching_notes: Keep delivering concrete, step-by-step plans and encourage logging. Acknowledge environmental factors and normalize slips. Continue offering micro-habits and quick check-ins to maintain momentum.
